parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post information.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any specific parliamentary candidate by name, surname, or any other clear identifier.  The content focuses on energy projects and their long-term impact, not on any particular candidate or party's platform.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and its content addresses general societal concerns about energy investment and future generations. The reach estimate indicates a wide potential audience.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The primary objective of the post is to discuss the importance of long-term energy investments. While energy policy might be a topic debated during elections, this post doesn't explicitly advocate for or against any candidate or party's stance on the issue. There is no call to action related to voting.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>True. The post presents information and an opinion on a matter of public interest (energy policy). It's presented in a style consistent with journalistic or citizen journalism, aiming to inform and raise awareness rather than directly influencing votes.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. While the post expresses an opinion on the importance of energy investments, it's not a personal opinion unrelated to the election. However, it's presented as a general societal concern, not as an endorsement of a specific candidate or party.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1128410958768393</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, while discussing a topic relevant to political discourse (energy policy), does not constitute electoral propaganda under Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.  The post lacks any direct or indirect endorsement of a specific candidate or party participating in the parliamentary elections. It focuses on a general societal issue, presented in an informative and opinionated style consistent with journalistic or citizen journalism.  The absence of a CMF number further supports this conclusion.  The post's objective appears to be raising awareness about the importance of long-term energy investments, not influencing voters' choices in the election.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>Eoficial.ro</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
